title: Knaresborough
name: Mother Shipton's Cave and the Petrifying Well
hours: April 1st - October 31st: Open daily, 10.00am - 5.30pm (''last entry 5pm. please check winter opening hours'')
content: "At the Petrifying Well one can see a whole host of everyday objects slowly being petrified in the cascading waters. The most popular item is a teddy bear or soft toy which usually takes between three and five months to turn to stone." Suggested visiting time: 30min - 1hr.
